caption: Two men are having a conversation, and the white-haired man appears very proud. He says something to the other man, who looks composed and does not respond.Inside the cave, a man is frantically knocking on a door. A chubby man enters and attempts to assault him. The man says something and engages in constant negotiations with the chubby man. Eventually, the chubby man brings him before a woman, in a large hall, and they argue. In the end, they seem to decide on something that looks like a duel, as another man steps forward, wanting to duel with him.
